This greasy stick emits a stomach-churning scent when held in a hand.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2) of the indicated level. A creature that takes acid damage from this spell must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2) of the appropriate level.
